title: The 'Indra' Rose Gold Emerald and Diamond Vanki Bangle
features: Modern interpretation of the traditional Vanki (armlet), featuring a central oval-cut Emerald surrounded by concentric circles of dazzling diamonds. The rose gold base showcases an intricate filigree design. The openable design ensures a comfortable fit. The secure clasp closure guarantees safety.
occasions: or a statement piece for special occasions. Can be paired with traditional sarees or Western attire for a fusion look.
description: This 'Indra' Vanki bangle seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with contemporary aesthetics. The rose gold hue adds a touch of modern elegance, while the emerald symbolizes prosperity and good fortune (Subham). The meticulous craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and value.
